attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to save the Post Office on Comberton Hill, Kidderminster from closure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Post Office on Comberton Hill, Kidderminster is a viable and profit-making business. 
It is situated at the heart of the thriving Comberton Hill business community and provides a range of services both to the businesses located in this area and to local community members.
Additionally, the Post Office on Comberton Hill receives a significant amount of trade from outside the immediate community due to the fact that it is located on a main arterial road carrying traffic to and from Kidderminster town and is also situated directly opposite the town's railway station.
Closure of this branch will, therefore, detrimentally deprive the many local businesses and members of the public of vital services.
Furthermore, the Post Office Ltd have prepared a report which conveys the information upon which the decision to close the Comberton Hill Post Office has been based and this is factually incorrect for a number of reasons.
